attributes.action: Use troops released from Iraq to patrol OUR streets and protect British citizens from teenage vilonce and disorder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of our troops maintaining safety in foreign lands, let's use them to curb the out of control yobs who make walking in our streets unsafe. These neds are out of control in every town up and down the country yet the gonernment refuses to accept this social breakdown in our society.

rejection.details: Please do not use derogatory terms in your petition.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
